description: This file defines a service for generating and storing .docx report documents based on trends data in a mechanical engineering context. It includes interfaces and implementation for creating Word documents with formatted content, bullet points, and in-memory storage.

classes.name: IReportService
classes.description: An interface defining methods for generating reports and retrieving reports or their data.

classes.name: ReportService
classes.description: Implements report generation, storage, and retrieval, producing .docx reports with trend data.

methods.name: GenerateReport
methods.description: Creates a .docx report from trends and stores it in-memory, returning its GUID.

methods.name: TryGetReport
methods.description: Retrieves stored report content by GUID if it exists.

methods.name: TryGetReportData
methods.description: Retrieves the raw trend data used for a report if available.

methods.name: BuildDocx
methods.description: Constructs a .docx document with a heading, date, and a list of trends formatted as bullet points.

methods.name: CreateParagraph
methods.description: Helper to create a formatted paragraph with optional bold, italic, and font size.

methods.name: CreateBulletParagraph
methods.description: Helper to create a bullet point paragraph at a specified indentation level.

methods.name: EnsureNumberingDefinitions
methods.description: Sets up the numbering definitions for bullet lists in the Word document.
